input: Subject: A serene lavender field; Characteristics: endless rows of blooming lavender; Timing and lighting: late afternoon with soft sunlight; Background: distant hills and clear sky; Feeling: calming and fragrant.
coverage: A serene lavender field with endless rows of vibrant blooming lavender stretches out under the soft, golden light of the late afternoon sun. The gentle sunlight casts a warm glow, highlighting the lush purple flowers and creating subtle shadows across the landscape. In the background, distant rolling hills blend seamlessly into a clear, expansive sky, enhancing the sense of space and tranquility. The overall scene exudes a calming and fragrant atmosphere, inviting viewers to immerse themselves in the peaceful beauty and soothing scent of the lavender.
validityText:
The input uses labeled sections (e.g., "Subject:", "Characteristics:") instead of a single, cohesive natural language paragraph. According to the specification, the input must be a natural language description and a single paragraph, which the structured format violates.
